Southfield.Eliza Howell Park: Eliza Howell Park is a public park in Brightmoor, Detroit, Michigan. Howell Park, near Fenkell and Telegraph, has 250 acres (100 ha) of land, making it the fourth largest park in Detroit; this is about one fourth of the area of Belle Isle or .25 square miles (0.65 km2). A greenway links Howell with Stoepel Park.
